p: The present study had some limitations as well. First of all, EA was only administered for two cycles. Besides, the participants were college students and could not represent the general population of women with PMS. Self-report questionnaires were used to assess the intensity of PMS, which can affect the participantâ€™s responses. Nevertheless, the main strength of this study was that it is the first research conducted on this topic and also the first to use validated PMS questionnaires.
